items.name: Wood
items.description: Obtained from trees. Refined into workable materials at the Resource Refinery and then transported to your Warband Driftmark to hand in for Faction Contribution and Warband Medals. A vital resource for all Warbands

items.name: Scrap Part
items.description: Obtained from scrap wreckages. Refined into workable materials at the Resource Refinery and then transported to your Warband Driftmark to hand in for Faction Contribution and Warband Medals. A vital resource for all Warbands

items.name: Biological Genes
items.description: Obtained from animals. Refined into workable materials at the Resource Refinery and then transported to your Warband Driftmark to hand in for Faction Contribution and Warband Medals. A vital resource for all Warbands

items.name: Cutting Plate
items.description: Warband resource obtained by refining [Wood]. Can be submitted to Warband Driftmark, and can be transported from Warband Driftmark to Foundry to create important structures

items.name: Refined Part
items.description: Warband resource obtained by refining [Scrap Parts]. Can be submitted to Warband Driftmark, and can be transported from Warband Driftmark to Foundry to create important structures

items.name: Pure Biological Genes
items.description: Warband resource obtained by refining [Biological Genes]. Can be submitted to Warband Driftmark, and can be transported from Warband Driftmark to Foundry to create important structures

items.name: Resin
items.description: Obtained from trees. Used to create all manner of useful items at your Driftmark's Supply Depot, Siege Constructor, or Fabricator

items.name: Scrap Iron
items.description: Obtained from scrap wreckages. Used to create all manner of useful items at your Driftmark's Supply Depot, Siege Constructor, or Fabricator

items.name: Protein
items.description: Obtained from animals. Used to create all manner of useful items at your Driftmark's Supply Depot, Siege Constructor, or Fabricator

items.name: Pure Blood
items.description: Obtained from animals. Used to create all manner of useful items at your Driftmark's Supply Depot, Siege Constructor, or Fabricator

items.name: Golden Deer Blood
items.description: Blood from the Golden Deer King. Can be sold for Starfall Tokens at the Trading House

items.name: Pure Golden Deer Blood
items.description: An incredibly rare resource. Likely fetches a high price at the Trading House

items.name: Crimson Dinosaur Blood
items.description: Blood from a Crimson Dinosaur. Can be sold for Starfall Tokens at the Trading House

items.name: Pure Crimson Dinosaur Blood
items.description: An incredibly rare resource. Likely fetches a high price at the Trading House

items.name: Drifter Endurance Supplement
items.description: Used at the Drifter Pod to replenish 20 endurance to a Drifter.

items.name: Common Toxincoil
items.description: Survival supplies for the common folk of ATHAS, exchangeable for Starfall Tokens at the Trading House

items.name: Uncommon Toxincoil
items.description: Survival supplies for the common folk of ATHAS, exchangeable for Starfall Tokens at the Trading House

items.name: Rare Toxincoil
items.description: Survival supplies for the common folk of ATHAS, exchangeable for Starfall Tokens at the Trading House

items.name: Epic Toxincoil
items.description: Survival supplies for the common folk of ATHAS, exchangeable for Starfall Tokens at the Trading House

items.name: Legendary Toxincoil
items.description: Survival supplies for the common folk of ATHAS, exchangeable for Starfall Tokens at the Trading House

items.name: Abandoned Toxincoil
items.description: Survival supplies for the common folk of ATHAS, exchangeable for Starfall Tokens at the Trading House

items.name: Basic Fire-Eater Trap Activator
items.description: Essential material for attracting Fire Eaters (Tiers V to VI), which grant plentiful experience when slain! Location: Fire-Eater Trap

items.name: Advanced Fire-Eater Trap Activator
items.description: Essential material for attracting Fire Eaters (Tiers VII to XI), which grant plentiful experience when slain! Location: Fire-Eater Trap

items.name: Echo-Shard
items.description: Essential material for exploring Small Rifts (Tiers IV to VI). While rifts contain abundant resources, explore them with caution as players of other factions may attack! How to use: Driftmark - Rift Scanner

items.name: Advanced Echo-Shard
items.description: Essential material for exploring Small Rifts (Tiers VII to XI). While rifts contain abundant resources, explore them with caution as players of other factions may attack! How to use: Driftmark - Rift Scanner

items.name: Driftmark Backup Power
items.description: Immediately restores 200 Driftmark energy on use. Driftmark Energy is used for relocating Driftmarks

items.name: Enhanced Equipment Charging
items.description:
Charges all equipped items 
Boosts equipment Power by 40 for 30 minutes.
Equipment loses 30% Durability when effect ends

items.name: Harvester Guardian Rune
items.description: Use to make enemy Ancient Guardians (Harvester Hub Guardians, Perimeter Guardians, etc.) within 50m Controlled by highest rune command, becomes paralyzed for 30s; immune to this effect for 180s

items.name: Driftmark Crisis Defense Module
items.description:
Use to grant allied Driftmarks in this scene Driftmark Defense, lasting 120s. 
[Driftmark Defense]
Reduces damage taken by 50%

items.name: EM Generator
items.description: Use to disable enemy Driftmark Defense Turrets and grant Increases Attack Speed by 100% and reduces MP cost by 100% to allied Driftmark Defense Turrets within 50m for 120s

items.name: Field Repair Materials
items.description: Essential material for melding, repairing Power Mech: Welder vehicles, structures and defensive buildings

items.name: Power Mech: Welder
items.description: Summons a powerful  Power Mech: Welder vehicle

items.name: Faction Change Card
items.description: Automatically spent when switching factions, granting you a free faction change while retaining 100% Faction Contribution

items.name: Mechanical Mount
items.description: Grants a random Mechanical Mount

items.name: War Horn
items.description: Use on maps conquered by your Faction. Declare war on the Harvester Hub in this map. After a 6-hour preparation period, members of your Warband will become hostile to non-Warband units in this map. The Harvester Hub can be conquered during War Time.

items.name: Truce Horn
items.description: Use on the map where war is declared to stop the declaration.

items.name: Great Booster Kit
items.description: A Great Booster Kit is available at the Catch-up Store. The kit takes you to Driftmaster Level 30 and your Driftmark to level 7

items.name: Active Exergy
items.description: Can be submitted to your Warband at Warband Driftmark in return for Faction Contribution and Warband Medals, used for upgrading Warband technology and producing powerful weapons of war

items.name: Juvenile Cannon Beast
items.description: Hand in to the Warband Driftmark to receive Faction Contribution and Warband Medals. These can be used to breed Cannon Beasts in the Beast Vehicle Fabricator at the Warband Driftmark.

items.name: Juvenile Charge Beast
items.description: Hand in to the Warband Driftmark to receive Faction Contribution and Warband Medals. These can be handed in to your Warband. Used for breeding Charge Beasts at the Warband Driftmark's Beast Vehicle Fabricator.

items.name: Juvenile Behemoth
items.description: Hand in to the Warband Driftmark to receive Faction Contribution and Warband Medals. These can be used to breed mighty Behemoths at the Warband Driftmark's Beast Vehicle Fabricator.

items.name: Juvenile Warp Beast
items.description: Hand in to the Warband Driftmark to receive Faction Contribution and Warband Medals, which can be used to breed Warp Beasts in the Beast Vehicle Fabricator at the Warband Driftmark.

items.name: Juvenile Beast Generator
items.description: Grants a random juvenile Warband Beast Vehicle

items.name: Core Engine
items.description: A rare and highly valuable engine that remains operational. Can be handed in to your Warband at the Warband Driftmark for Faction Contribution and Warband Medals. Used to produce large Siege Weapons at the Mechanical Vehicle Fabricator.

items.name: Nomad Post Kit
items.description: Creates a Nomad Post for rapid mobilization, equipment repairs, Drifters, and access to the Underground Bazaar (can only be deployed/stationed in occupied territory)

items.name: Warband Building Upgrade Material
items.description: Used for upgrading the Warband Constructor and Heavy Defense structures. Produced in the Foundry

items.name: [T8] Artificial Exergy Vein Kit
items.description: Places a T8 Warband Exergy Vein with higher concentration than natural ones, boosting mining efficiency by 20%. Disappears when depleted. Only 1 artificial Warband vein can exist at a time

items.name: [T10] Artificial Exergy Vein Kit
items.description: Places a T10 Warband Exergy Vein with higher concentration than natural ones, boosting mining efficiency by 20%. Disappears when depleted. Only 1 artificial Warband vein can exist at a time

items.name: Foundry Kit
items.description: Places a Foundry, essential for reinforcing Harvester Hubs and building various heavy structures. Must be built near Power Station. Only 1 can exist at a time

items.name: Exergy Refinery Kit
items.description: Places an Exergy Refinery that extracts Active Exergy. Must be built near Exergy Rift. Only 1 can exist at a time

items.name: Warband Deployment Nomad Post Kit
items.description: Places a Warband Deployment Nomad Post, allowing all Warband members to mobilize there. Only 2 can exist at a time

items.name: Hell-Scourge Com-Station Kit
items.description:
Places a Hell-Scourge Com-Station, enabling low-orbit strikes on adjacent maps. Only 1 can exist at a time
--[Railgun Strike]-- 
Channel orbital railgun to continuously bombard the target location for 120s. Every 0.5s, deals  
[Target-based Max HP 20%] Physical Damage based on Max HP to enemies within 12m and inflicts Quantum Collapse. Buildings take 
[Damage Rate: 600%] +  
[Target-based Building Durability Cap 0.4%] Max Durability as Siege Damage. 
Bombarded ground cannot be built on for 2 days 
[Quantum Collapse]
Max HP reduced by 5%, stacks up to 10 times, lasts 1800s (Effect persists on mobs even after leaving combat)

items.name: Advanced Outpost Sentry Bot Kit
items.description:
Places a Advanced Warband Sentry Bot to patrol and attack nearby enemies. Up to 3 can exist at a time.
Cannot be placed in Fire Vein, Underground Mines, or other Instance Maps

items.name: Top-tier Battle Group Watchtower Kit
items.description:
Places a Top-tier Combat Unit Sentry Robot that patrols a wide area and attacks enemies. Up to 3 can exist at a time.
Cannot be placed in Firevein Caverns, Underground Mine Shafts, or other dungeon maps.

items.name: Warband Harvester Node Kit
items.description:
Places a Warband Harvester Node, granting the Warband the right to attack and occupy Harvester Hubs on the map. Only 1 can exist at a time.
Restricted to Deepmarch Ring levels

items.name: Warning Sign Kit
items.description: Places a Warning Sign with a message. Only 3 can exist at a time

items.name: MOD Core
items.description:
Enables the creation of MODs at the MOD Machine.
The MOD Machine can be found at the Underground Bazaar and requires Driftmaster Level 30 to use.

items.name: MOD Calibrator
items.description: Used to reset the power of legendary MODs

items.name: Starfall Tokens
items.description: Used for constructing Driftmarks, researching technologies, producing items and purchasing equipment

items.name: Repair Tickets
items.description: Used in place of Starfall Tokens when repairing equipment at a 1:1 ratio.

items.name: Exergy
items.description: Used for constructing infrastructure and researching technology at Driftmarks

items.name: Faction Medals
items.description: Can be traded for rare items at the Faction Store in the Underground Bazaar

items.name: Faction Contribution
items.description: Weekly Faction Contribution. Used for opening weekly Faction Contribution supply crates

items.name: PvP Contribution
items.description: PvP Contribution

items.name: PvP Medals
items.description: Can be traded for valuable items at War Supplies in the Underground Bazaar

items.name: Ancient Battle Scar Fragment
items.description: Several Ancient Battle Scar Fragments can be synthesized to create a Battle Scar of your choice.

items.name: Warband Medals
items.description: Can be traded for rare items at the Warband Store at the Warband Driftmark

items.name: Data Fragment
items.description: Material required to unlock equipment.

items.name: Veinhold Currency
items.description: Currency converted from Exergy Residue Shards, used to exchange for valuable rewards at the Veinhold Extraction Store.

items.name: Season Merit
items.description: Season Merit

items.name: Promotion Medal
items.description:
Players who join later can obtain this to trade for supplies at the Promotion Quartermaster in the Warband Driftmark.
Warband will receive an additional "Active Exergy" every time players trades supplies.

items.name: Spray Token
items.description: Spray Paint Tokens needed to use spray

items.name: Void Exergy
items.description: Obtained after defeating monsters that appear in Eclipse Rifts. Can be exchanged for items at the Rift Merchant in the Underground Bazaar

items.name: Solarbite
items.description: Used for bidding on actions, and can be traded for Eclipsium

items.name: Eclipsium
items.description: Used for purchasing goods at the Exotic Shop
